UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Prediction and characterization of a novel hemocyanin-derived antimicrobial peptide from shrimp Litopenaeus vannamei.
Literature.Author: Yang S, Huang H, Wang F, Aweya JJ, Zheng Z, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio parahaemolyticus(MIC=250µg/ml),Vibrio fluvialis(MIC=250µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus(MIC=15.6µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=125µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>250µg/ml)
